Posts.Content: Dec 1, 2014 02:53PM ChristyLee70 wrote: I experienced muscle spasms in my low back as a result of the Taxol. It sent me to the ER because once it started and progressed to where I couldn't stand or lay down with out my body contracting. It was terribly painful. I was given muscle relaxers and pain pills to control it. Once I ended the Taxol, they went away. I wish you well.
Posts.Title: Taxol side effect? Nancy2581 ChristyLee70
